Paper & card recycling: Black wheelie bins with blue lid | Collected every 2 weeks (alternates with mixed recycling)

Mixed recycling: Green boxes | Collected every 2 weeks (alternates with mixed recycling)

Rubbish: Black wheelie bin | Collected every 2 weeks

Food waste recycling (outdoors): Large brown caddy | Collected every week

Recycle textiles and batteries: Put textiles in a tied carrier bag and batteries in an open carrier bag. Put out on bin day for recycling!

Recycling: Metal communal bin with green lid | Collected weekly

Rubbish: Metal communal bin with black lid | Collected weekly

Recycling: Purple bags | Collected weekly or twice-weekly if in a time-banded area*

Rubbish: Blue bags | Collected weekly or twice-weekly if in a time-banded area*

Mixed recycling: Blue stripe sacks | Collected every 2 weeks

Rubbish: Red stripe sacks | Collected every 2 weeks

Food waste recycling (outdoors): Large brown caddy | Collected every week
